desc: SwapTriplePos-Birth is a transformation method specially designed for birth relation. It paraphrases the sentence and keeps the original birth relation between the entity pairs.

examples.ori: John was born in 1938 and graduated from Fudan University.
examples.trans: Born in 1938, John was graduated from Fudan University.

examples.ori: Ross, born in California, worked for Intel at 1933.
examples.trans: Born in California, John worked for Intel at 1933.
